title: Encoded Orders
description: Decode and correct the scrambled transmission.
objective: Fix all errors in the message, then save and exit.
quote:
The enemy's interference grows stronger.
More errors slip through with each transmission.

Stay focused. Every correction counts.
victory_quote:
Orders decoded and relayed.
Agent Delta is en route.

Your attention to detail is impressive.
lore:
Another urgent transmission has come through,
but enemy jamming has corrupted the signal.

This one is longer and more garbled than before.
Use what you've learned: 'i' to insert, 'x' to delete.

The operation depends on accurate intel.
